ingredients.item: 400ml can Cooksâ€™ Ingredients Organic Coconut Milk
75g Waitrose Duchy Organic Long Grain Rice
125g pack Waitrose Duchy Organic Baby Corn, halved lengthways
150g pack Waitrose Duchy Organic Raw King Prawns

instructions.step: Bring the stock, coconut milk and curry paste to the boil in a large saucepan. Add the rice, and cover and cook for 5 minutes. Add the baby corn, and cook for a further 5 minutes.
Stir in the prawns and spinach, and cook for 1-2 minutes until the prawns have turned pink and are cooked through.
